name: Goblin Cave Adventure
description: Investigate the disturbances around the village of Oakhaven, starting with the nearby goblin cave. Goblins have been raiding the village's supplies, and there are rumors of a deeper darkness stirring in the ancient Whispering Woods.

starting_location.name: Goblin Cave Entrance
starting_location.description: The mouth of a dark cave where goblins have been spotted. The air is thick with the scent of unwashed bodies and rotting meat.

campaign_goal: Investigate the disturbances around the village of Oakhaven, starting with the nearby goblin cave.

npc_willow.name: Old Man Willow
npc_willow.description: An ancient, nature-bound guardian of the Whispering Woods. Initially gruff but potentially helpful if respected. Met in a clearing.

npc_grak.name: Grak the Goblin Boss
npc_grak.description: Leader of the goblins in the cave. Likely tougher than the others. Not yet encountered.

quest_cave.title: Clear the Goblin Cave
quest_cave.description: Goblins from a nearby cave have been raiding Oakhaven's supplies. Find their cave and stop them.

quest_willow_task.title: Willow's Disturbance
quest_willow_task.description: Old Man Willow mentioned a 'foul disturbance' deeper in the woods stirring the spirits. He might grant safe passage if it's dealt with.

world_lore: The Whispering Woods are ancient and rumored to be magical.
Goblins are generally cowardly but can be dangerous in groups or when cornered.
Oakhaven is a small, relatively peaceful village reliant on farming and lumber.
event_summary: The party accepted the quest to investigate the goblin cave near Oakhaven.
They entered the Whispering Woods and encountered Old Man Willow.
Willow offered potential aid if the party deals with a disturbance he mentioned.
The party found goblin tracks and followed them.
opening_narrative: You've cautiously entered the damp cave, the narrow passage opening into a larger chamber dimly lit by sputtering torches. The air is thick with the foul stench of goblins. Ahead, huddled around a crackling campfire chewing on dubious meat, are two goblins. They haven't spotted you yet, their backs mostly turned. One has a crude spear leaning against the wall nearby, the other clutches a wicked-looking dagger. What do you do?
